title: Father Christmas
desc: Father Christmas is back! Find him in our Tudor Great Hall by a roaring fire ready to hear all of your Christmas wishes. With the Christmas tree, elves' gift wrapping station, Father Christmas's desk and the naughty and nice list all on display, this is a very special and atmospheric experience.  ? K nock on the door, listen for the bell before the whole family enters for a special one-on-one meeting with Father Christmas where each child will receive a small gift. Join in with our Christmas crafts while you wait. ? Family and friends groups may attend together, children must be accompanied by an adult.
